title: Identification of electromyographic patterns of bradykinesia in patients with Parkinson's disease

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Nikita Kozulin, Anastasiya Migulina, Denis Mokrushin, Gurgen Soghoyan, Aleksandr Artemenko, Artur Biktimirov
